comments.body: The address shop.canaan.io is not the issue here. That I/we know is valid.The problem is that neither of Canaan's websites make any mention of having telegram or any other social media channels.If that telegram channel is officially endorsed by Canaan then the website should list it.Considering that in the past Canaan has taken great pains to warn about using sites/sales channels that are not endorsed by them I find it baffling for them to now start opening sm contacts and not put that info on their websites so we can know those specific channels can be trusted.  Since those public announcements are not there -- extreme skepticism is called for.
